markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Dismissing](/Rules.aspx?ID=2245)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 302 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Some spells can be dismissed, ending the duration early. This requires the caster or target to use the Dismiss action (page 419).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Dismissing

<summary>
Some spells can be dismissed, ending the duration early. This requires the caster or target to use the Dismiss action (page 419).
</summary>
